016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.server;
017
018import com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.concurrent.CompletableFutures;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ReactiveStreamsServer;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ServerShutdownStreamException;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.common.ReactiveStreamsAbstractService;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.common.LocalStreamFactories;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageReader;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageWorkers;
027import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageWriter;
028import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.util.FutureProcessor;
029import jakarta.inject.Inject;
030import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.LoggerContext;
032import org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletContextHandler;
033import org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHolder;
034import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.*;
035import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.ContractsProvided;
036import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
037import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
038import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
039
040import java.lang.reflect.Type;
041import java.util.List;
042import java.util.Map;
043import java.util.Optional;
044import java.util.concurrent.*;
045import java.util.function.Function;
046import java.util.function.Supplier;
047
048@Service(name = "reactivestreams.server")
049@ContractsProvided({ReactiveStreamsServer.class, ReactiveStreamsServerService.class, ProgressStartedListener.class, LocalStreamFactories.class})
050@RunLevel(6)
051public class ReactiveStreamsServerService
052        extends ReactiveStreamsAbstractService
053        implements ReactiveStreamsServer,
054        ProgressStartedListener,
055        LocalStreamFactories {
056    private final ReactiveStreamsServerConfiguration reactiveStreamsServerConfiguration;
057    private final LoggerContext loggerContext;
058
059    private final Map<String, Supplier<Object>> publisherEndpointFactories = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
060    private final Map<String, WrappedPublisherFactory> publisherLocalFactories = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
061    private final Map<String, Supplier<Object>> subscriberEndpointFactories = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
062    private final Map<String, WrappedSubscriberFactory> subscriberLocalFactories = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
063
064    private final MetricRegistry metricRegistry;
065
066    // Currently active subscriptions
067    // These need to cancel on shutdown
068    protected final List<FutureProcessor<Object>> activeSubscriptions = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
069
070    // Currently active publishers and subscribers
071    // These need to cancel on shutdown
072    protected final List<CompletableFuture<Object>> activePublisherAndSubscribers = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
073
074    @Inject
075    public ReactiveStreamsServerService(Configuration configuration,
076                                        MetricRegistry metricRegistry,
077                                        MessageWorkers messageWorkers,
078                                        ServletContextHandler servletContextHandler,
079                                        Logger logger,
080                                        LoggerContext loggerContext) {
081        super(messageWorkers, logger);
082        this.metricRegistry = metricRegistry;
083
084        reactiveStreamsServerConfiguration = new ReactiveStreamsServerConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("reactivestreams.server"));
085        this.loggerContext = loggerContext;
086
087        PublishersReactiveStreamsServlet publishersServlet = new PublishersReactiveStreamsServlet(reactiveStreamsServerConfiguration, streamName ->
088        {
089            return Optional.ofNullable(publisherEndpointFactories.get(streamName)).map(Supplier::get).orElse(null);
090        });
091        servletContextHandler.addServlet(new ServletHolder("reactivestreamspublisher", publishersServlet), "/streams/publishers/*");
092
093        SubscribersReactiveStreamsServlet subscribersServlet = new SubscribersReactiveStreamsServlet(reactiveStreamsServerConfiguration, streamName ->
094        {
095            return Optional.ofNullable(subscriberEndpointFactories.get(streamName)).map(Supplier::get).orElse(null);
096        });
097        servletContextHandler.addServlet(new ServletHolder("reactivestreamssubscriber", subscribersServlet), "/streams/subscribers/*");
098
099    }
100
101    public CompletableFuture<Void> publisher(String streamName,
102                                             final Function<Configuration, ? extends Publisher<?>> publisherFactory,
103                                             Class<? extends Publisher<?>> publisherType) {
104        CompletableFuture<Void> result = new CompletableFuture<>();
105
106        Type type = resolveActualTypeArgs(publisherType, Publisher.class)[0];
107        Type eventType = getEventType(type);
108        Optional<Type> resultType = getResultType(type);
109        MessageWriter<Object> eventWriter = getWriter(eventType);
110        MessageReader<Object> resultReader = resultType.map(this::getReader).orElse(null);
111
112        Function<Configuration, Publisher<Object>> wrappedPublisherFactory = (config) ->
113        {
114            Publisher<Object> publisher = (Publisher<Object>) publisherFactory.apply(config);
115
116            CompletableFuture<Void> subscriptionResult = new CompletableFuture<>();
117            FutureProcessor<Object> futureProcessor = new FutureProcessor<>(subscriptionResult);
118            subscriptionResult.whenComplete((r, t) ->
119                    {
120                        activeSubscriptions.remove(futureProcessor);
121                    }
122            );
123
124            publisher.subscribe(futureProcessor);
125            activeSubscriptions.add(futureProcessor);
126            // Cancel this subscription when the publisher itself cancels
127            result.whenComplete(CompletableFutures.transfer(subscriptionResult));
128            return futureProcessor;
129        };
130
131        publisherEndpointFactories.put(streamName, () ->
132                resultReader == null ?
133                        new PublisherSubscriptionReactiveStream(streamName, wrappedPublisherFactory, eventWriter, objectMapper, byteBufferPool, loggerContext.getLogger(PublisherSubscriptionReactiveStream.class)) :
134                        new PublisherWithResultSubscriptionReactiveStream(streamName, wrappedPublisherFactory, eventWriter, resultReader, objectMapper, byteBufferPool, loggerContext.getLogger(PublisherWithResultSubscriptionReactiveStream.class)));
135        publisherLocalFactories.put(streamName, new WrappedPublisherFactory(wrappedPublisherFactory, publisherType));
136        result.whenComplete((r, t) ->
137        {
138            publisherEndpointFactories.remove(streamName);
139            publisherLocalFactories.remove(streamName);
140        });
141
142        return result;
143    }
144
145    public CompletableFuture<Void> subscriber(String streamName,
146                                              Function<Configuration, Subscriber<?>> subscriberFactory,
147                                              Class<? extends Subscriber<?>> subscriberType) {
148        CompletableFuture<Void> result = new CompletableFuture<>();
149
150        Type type = resolveActualTypeArgs(subscriberType, Subscriber.class)[0];
151        Type eventType = getEventType(type);
152        Optional<Type> resultType = getResultType(type);
153        MessageReader<Object> eventReader = getReader(eventType);
154        MessageWriter<Object> resultWriter = resultType.map(this::getWriter).orElse(null);
155
156        Function<Configuration, Subscriber<Object>> wrappedSubscriberFactory = (config) ->
157        {
158            Subscriber<Object> subscriber = (Subscriber<Object>) subscriberFactory.apply(config);
159
160            CompletableFuture<Void> subscriptionResult = new CompletableFuture<>();
161            FutureProcessor<Object> futureProcessor = new FutureProcessor<>(subscriptionResult);
162            futureProcessor.subscribe(subscriber);
163            activeSubscriptions.add(futureProcessor);
164            // Cancel this subscription when the subscriber itself cancels
165            result.whenComplete(CompletableFutures.transfer(subscriptionResult));
166            result.whenComplete((r, t) -> activeSubscriptions.remove(futureProcessor));
167            return futureProcessor;
168        };
169
170        subscriberEndpointFactories.put(streamName, () ->
171                resultWriter == null ? new SubscriberSubscriptionReactiveStream(streamName, wrappedSubscriberFactory, eventReader, objectMapper, byteBufferPool, metricRegistry, loggerContext.getLogger(SubscriberSubscriptionReactiveStream.class)) :
172                        new SubscriberWithResultSubscriptionReactiveStream(streamName, wrappedSubscriberFactory, eventReader, resultWriter, objectMapper, byteBufferPool, metricRegistry, loggerContext.getLogger(SubscriberWithResultSubscriptionReactiveStream.class)));
173        subscriberLocalFactories.put(streamName, new WrappedSubscriberFactory(wrappedSubscriberFactory, subscriberType));
174        result.whenComplete((r, t) ->
175        {
176            subscriberEndpointFactories.remove(streamName);
177            subscriberLocalFactories.remove(streamName);
178        });
179
180        return result;
181    }
182
183
184    public WrappedSubscriberFactory getSubscriberFactory(String streamName) {
185        return subscriberLocalFactories.get(streamName);
186    }
187
188    public WrappedPublisherFactory getPublisherFactory(String streamName) {
189        return publisherLocalFactories.get(streamName);
190    }
191
192    @Override
193    public void onProgressStarting(ChangeableRunLevelFuture currentJob, int currentLevel) {
194        if (currentLevel == 20 && currentJob.getProposedLevel() < currentLevel) {
195            // Close existing streams
196            logger.info("Cancel subscriptions on shutdown");
197
198            // Cancel all subscriptions
199            for (FutureProcessor<Object> activeSubscription : activeSubscriptions) {
200                activeSubscription.close();
201            }
202
203            // Wait for them to finish
204            for (FutureProcessor<Object> activePublisherSubscription : activeSubscriptions) {
205                try {
206                    activePublisherSubscription.getResult().get(10, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
207                    logger.debug("Subscription closed");
208                } catch (CancellationException e) {
209                    // Ignore, this is ok
210                } catch (Throwable e) {
211                    logger.warn("Could not shutdown subscription", e);
212                }
213            }
214
215            // Close publisher futures
216            for (CompletableFuture<Object> activePublisherAndSubscriber : activePublisherAndSubscribers) {
217                activePublisherAndSubscriber.completeExceptionally(new ServerShutdownStreamException("Shutting down server"));
218            }
219        }
220    }
221}
